Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.view.userinterface.GUI.screens.Screen
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.view.userinterface.GUI.screens.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScreenInterface, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameScreen
extends Screen
This class containes the graphical elements for display the game terrain, worker and card
Author:
Mattia Malacarne
